name: Raging Lung
description:
The smell of lavender and death is intertwined among the candles.
Stranger. Unfamiliar landscape outside the window.
Pictures on TV: other's memories...
A small moth entangled in a web of nightmares and memories is a sad spectacle.
Can he make the right decision and get out? Or is there no right solution?
Help the boy out and solve the mysteries of Raging Lung, a game inspired by David Lynch, Distraint and Omori. Unravel Seb's story by interacting with objects and NPCs!
